description: Analyze images by providing their URLs and receive detailed insights using advanced image recognition. Leverage the power of the GPT-4o-mini model for high-accuracy image analysis and validation of image URLs.

tools.name: analyze_image
tools.description: Receives an image URL and analyzes the image content using GPT-4o-mini

imageUrl.description: URL of the image to analyze

tools.name: analyze_image_from_path
tools.description: Loads an image from a local file path and analyzes its content using GPT-4o-mini. AI assistants need to provide a valid path for the server execution environment (e.g., Linux path if the server is running on WSL).

imagePath.description: Local file path of the image to analyze (must be accessible from the server execution environment)

openaiApiKey.description: Your OpenAI API key required for image analysis.
